name: tooltip
docstring: Floating element that provides a control with contextual information via pointer or focus.

properties.name: default_open
properties.docstring: The open state of the tooltip when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.

properties.name: open
properties.docstring: The controlled open state of the tooltip. Must be used in conjunction with `on_open_change`.

properties.name: side
properties.docstring: The preferred side of the trigger to render against when open. Will be reversed when collisions occur and `avoid_collisions` is enabled.The position of the tooltip. Defaults to "top".

properties.name: side_offset
properties.docstring: The distance in pixels from the trigger. Defaults to 0.

properties.name: align
properties.docstring: The preferred alignment against the trigger. May change when collisions occur. Defaults to "center".

properties.name: align_offset
properties.docstring: An offset in pixels from the "start" or "end" alignment options.

properties.name: avoid_collisions
properties.docstring: When true, overrides the side and align preferences to prevent collisions with boundary edges. Defaults to True.

properties.name: collision_padding
properties.docstring: The distance in pixels from the boundary edges where collision detection should occur. Accepts a number (same for all sides), or a partial padding object, for example: { "top": 20, "left": 20 }. Defaults to 0.

properties.name: arrow_padding
properties.docstring: The padding between the arrow and the edges of the content. If your content has border-radius, this will prevent it from overflowing the corners. Defaults to 0.

properties.name: sticky
properties.docstring: The sticky behavior on the align axis. "partial" will keep the content in the boundary as long as the trigger is at least partially in the boundary whilst "always" will keep the content in the boundary regardless. Defaults to "partial".

properties.name: hide_when_detached
properties.docstring: Whether to hide the content when the trigger becomes fully occluded. Defaults to False.

properties.name: delay_duration
properties.docstring: Override the duration in milliseconds to customize the open delay for a specific tooltip. Default is 700.

properties.name: disable_hoverable_content
properties.docstring: Prevents Tooltip content from remaining open when hovering.

properties.name: force_mount
properties.docstring: Used to force mounting when more control is needed. Useful when controlling animation with React animation libraries.

properties.name: aria_label
properties.docstring: By default, screenreaders will announce the content inside the component. If this is not descriptive enough, or you have content that cannot be announced, use aria-label as a more descriptive label.

events.name: on_open_change
events.docstring: Fired when the open state changes.

events.name: on_escape_key_down
events.docstring: Fired when the escape key is pressed.

events.name: on_pointer_down_outside
events.docstring: Fired when the pointer is down outside the tooltip.
